list.abs: 天禧嘉福(WellWishing) MT-V100( 参数报价评论) 参数很简短，却把“天禧·爱”这款手机的主要特点囊括其中。

entry.def: Well-wishers are people who hope that a particular person or thing will be successful, and who show this by their behaviour.

example.ex: The main street was lined with well-wishers.
example.tran: 大街两旁满是祝福的人群。

baesInfo.translate_result: wallwasher（照明墙面的）墙照明装置
baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
